#c 我是Ka’angiana Mu’u，(那是)是我的名字。
#n nganai=maku可能採訪的時候會這麼說。

free: #e I’m going to tell a story about fishing.
#c 我要講比如說像釣魚的故事。

free: #e Speaking of fishing, if we go fishing, you don’t know how to fish, then we find the fishing pole first.
#c 如果說釣魚，不是很懂的話就不會釣魚, 因為釣魚我們要會懂先找釣竿。

free: #e If we cannot buy the fishing pole on the plain (in the city), we will make it on our own.
#c 如果我們沒有在平地買的話，釣竿我們要從桂竹那裏自己做。
#n te=kita takacicin kamanʉng (孔老師認為必較好)
#n kapani桂竹, to’oman 竹子的總稱

free: #e We need to cut down bamboo sticks.
#n te=pi=kita mʉngʉtʉn kapani (孔老師覺得比較好)

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #n 一定是用火弄直(matapuru起火, apuru火)
#n ma’inacU 直的, apu’inacU 使役

free: #e It we straighten it, it’ll be good to be used to fish.
#c 弄直的話才會很好用來釣魚。

free: #n akuun apinarasU takacicin 不要困擾自己

free: #e If we’re to go fishing, we need to dig hard for earthworms.
#c 只是當我們要釣魚的時候，只是讓我們困擾的是, 我們還要挖蚯蚓。
#n miUra ia ni-komoru=ku 昨天我有挖過

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e We dig for earthworms and get them on the hook.
#n nipapʉn-an-cu (sua) Cuma Mu’u (sua) ngʉca’ʉ 某某蚯蚓已經鉤好了(sua擇一)
#n ngʉca’ʉ sua nipapʉn-an-cu Cuma Mu’u (這句不太好)
#n patimanUngUn tia tanasa=musu 我把它弄好當作你的家!

free: #n te=ku pakinen ngʉca’ʉ na narupu 加na比較好
#n nipakinen=naku miʉra ngʉca’ʉ na narupu. 我昨天把魚餌掛好了
#n nipaken=cu=maku tikuru 我已經把衣服掛好了(也可以nipakinen)
#n pakinen 附著/連起來, tumatin掛, tumaten丟
#n te=ku pakinen ngʉca’ʉ na narupu 加na比較好

free: #n ka’an tia tavarʉ’ʉ-ʉn arinarupUn sua vutukuru魚沒有辦法(不能被)釣上來
#n ka’an tia tavarʉ’ʉ-ʉn arinarupUn sua vutukuru魚沒有辦法(不能被)釣上來

free: #e We hook them up, (otherwise) we won’t be able to catch the fish.
#c 鉤呢，如果沒有附著在魚鉤上，(不然)就不會鉤到那個魚。

free: #e But speaking of fishing, if we don’t have the skill, we need to go to the place where there are fish.
#c 但是有關釣魚，如果不是很會的話，(不懂得)要去經常有魚的地方。
#n taisua cau有人的地方，ta’una 有...的地方，to’ona ...的位置

free: #c 另外我們還要買魚鉤, 買魚絲, 栓在...

free: #e The fishing thread is tied up there on the hook.
#n kirin nia uracU 那個魚線栓在那邊
#n kumiri nia narupu 說明那個動作
#n kumiri sua Pani narupu, Pani在栓魚鉤
#n kumiri Pani sua narupu, 把魚鉤栓在Pani那邊
#n kumiri Pani narupu nia 通(Pani把narupu栓在那邊)

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e It’s not just about the hook where it (the thread) is tied.
#c 不是只有魚鉤要栓在那邊。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e We still have to tie the thread first, and then tie it on the hook.
#c 先要把魚絲栓在那哩，再把鉤子栓在那裡，然後再放鉛。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #n isee= ’esi sian (也可以代換為una, 但isee有種人為刻意放置的)
#n isee= ’esi sian (也可以代換為una, 但isee有種人為刻意放置的)

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e If we don’t put VARUVARU, then we cannot fish.
#c 如果沒有放鉛的話，我們就不能釣魚。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e If we already put lead, the we can put the bait there.
#c 如果已經放了鉛，就可以放魚餌在那裡了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e The bait here means the earthworm.

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e As for the earthworms, we dig for them in the mountain.

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e If we’re not able to find any to serve as the bait, we cannot go fishing.
#c 如果不會找要當作魚餌的，我們就沒辦法釣魚。

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e To fish, we go to the converging point of the rivers.
#c 講到釣魚，我們去河流的交匯處。

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e You should know about the so-called ‘aaci’ (converging point of rivers).
#c 這個所謂的'aci(河流匯集處)你們知道嗎 !?

#c 如果河水漲了，比如像用魚網撈(魚)呢，那就是所謂的颱風。
